statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_name = 'Machine XYZ'
DELETE FROM mower_schedule WHERE id = 1 AND last_maintenance_date <= '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM tractor_schedule WHERE name = 'John Deere' AND next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM mower_details WHERE manufacturer = 'John Deere' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND schedule_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM tractors WHERE model = 'John Deere' AND serial_number = 'JD123456';
DELETE FROM Tractors WHERE brand = 'John Deere';
DELETE FROM Tractors WHERE model = 'John Deere' AND brand = 'XYZ';
